title: 22 Gift Ideas for People Who Love to Nap
text:
Winter is just around the corner, which means it's time for hot cocoa, holiday movie marathons, and plenty of mid-afternoon naps. No, seriously. There's nothing better than curling up on the couch in the middle of winter with a thick fleece blanket and falling asleep for a few minutes (or hours, we're not judging!).

With numerous health benefits and the fortune of helping you make it through the rest of your busy days, naps are truly an underrated health tool. And with the holiday season upon us, it's time to make the gift of napping available to everyone you love. Because seriously, who doesn't love a good nap?!

From aromatherapy diffusers that will help set the napping mood to blankets so soft you'll want one for yourself, we've rounded up the best gift ideas for people who love to nap.
